title.narrative: Strengthening protection mechanism though CBCPMs and youth engagement

description.narrative: The project will address comprehensive general protection and community-based protection activities through established community-based structures, including protection focal persons and youth groups. Plan International will work with community-based structures to monitor protection risks and needs for the purpose of risk mitigation and protection incidence and persons with specific needs for service provision. These range from discrimination, physical violence, tension between groups, lack of employment opportunities, lack of civil documentation amongst other risks.
